channel.title: Project Kickoff on A Place for Poor Examples

item.title: Kickoff Docs
item.description: What is a Project Kickoff? What is a project kick-off? A project kick-off meeting is the first meeting with the project team and the client of the project where applicable. This meeting is the time to establish common goals and the purpose of the project. Taken from the Atlassian Project Kickoff reference. Why a Project Kickoff? A project kickoff sets a clear outline of project goals and milestones. It’s a celebration of where you’re going as a group.
